thread.title: Driver suffers serious head injuries after car rollover
thread.title_full: Driver suffers serious head injuries after car rollover

author: @TessKelly_
title: Driver suffers serious head injuries after car rollover
text:
A driver is being treated for serious head injuries after a vehicle rollover near Wynyard overnight.
Tasmania Police and emergency services were called to Scotts Road, Myalla, just before 11pm on Wednesday, July 2, following reports that a car had rolled down an embankment.
The driver, who was the sole occupant of the vehicle, was transported to the North West Regional Hospital with serious head injuries.
In a statement on Thursday, police said the driver remained in hospital and was receiving treatment.
Investigations surrounding the cause of the crash are ongoing, police said.
Anyone with information should contact police on 131 444 or Crime Stoppers anonymously on 1800 333 000 or online at
crimestopperstas.com.au
